function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"RT-PCR testing for SARS-CoV-2 virus detection","Impact":"Misdiagnosis or false negatives leading to undetected spread of virus.","Mitigation":"Implement regular confirmatory testing and consider using supplementary diagnostic methods.","Technologies":"Advanced RT-PCR techniques for higher accuracy and sensitivity.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and the general population in contact with confirmed cases.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, testing laboratories, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Virus isolation and culture in Biosafety Level 3 (BSL-3) laboratory","Impact":"Potential for accidental release of the virus and spread in the laboratory environment.","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to biosafety protocols, regular inspections, and staff training.","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, and personal protective equipment (PPE).","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, and health and safety officers.","Owner":"Laboratory management and health and safety regulators."},{"Description":"Detection of viral RNA in isolation ward environment and staff PPE","Impact":"Risk of surface contamination and transmission within the healthcare setting.","Mitigation":"Enhanced cleaning and disinfection protocols, regular testing of environmental surfaces, and strict adherence to PPE usage guidelines.","Technologies":"Advanced surface disinfection technologies, rapid environmental testing kits, and improved PPE design.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and visitors in the isolation ward.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, infection control teams, and facility management."}]}
